'''Graham McTavish''' (born [[4 January]] [[1961]]) is a Scottish actor who has appeared in a variety of supporting roles in many television programmes, as well as being a prolific voice actor. He portrayed [[Dwalin]] in [[The Hobbit (film series)|''The Hobbit'' (film series)]].<ref>[http://www.comingsoon.net ComingSoon.net], "[http://www.comingsoon.net/news/movienews.php?id=71003 ''The Hobbit'' Casting Announced!]" dated 21 October 2010 (accessed 9 July 2011)</ref>

==Roles==
* [[2003]]: [[Secrets of Middle-Earth: Inside Tolkien's 'The Fellowship of the Ring]]: Himself / Presenter
* [[2003]]: [[Secrets of Middle-Earth: Inside Tolkien's 'The Return of the King]]: Himself / Presenter
* [[2003]]: [[Secrets of Middle-Earth: Inside Tolkien's 'Lord of the Rings]]: Himself / Presenter
* [[2012]]: [[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey]] : [[Dwalin]]
* [[2013]]: [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]: Dwalin
* [[2013]]: [[New Zealand: Home of Middle-earth]]: Himself 
* [[2015]]: [[Lego The Hobbit: The Video Game]]: Dwalin (archive footage)
* [[2014]]: [[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]: Dwalin
* [[2015]]: [[Recruiting the Five Armies]]: Himself
